item.Q:
Write the character:
this; these
item.A:
cǐ
因此 yīncǐ that is why; for that reason; therefore; for this reason

item.Q:
Write the character:
classics; sacred book; scripture; to pass through; to undergo; longitude; surname
item.A:
traditional: 經
jīng
经济 (經濟) jīngjì economy; economic

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: just (right); main; upright; straight; correct; principle
2: Chinese 1st month of year
item.A:
1: zhèng 2: zhēng
正确 (正確) zhèngquè correct; proper 正月 zhēngyuè first month of the lunar new year

item.Q:
Write the character:
power; force; strength
item.A:
lì
力量 lìliang power; force; strength

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: part
2: to divide; minute; (a measure word); (a unit of length = 0.33 centimeter)
item.A:
1: fèn 2: fēn
部分 bùfèn part; share; section; piece 分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction

item.Q:
Write the character:
hand; convenient
item.A:
shǒu
手段 shǒuduàn method; mean (of doing sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
former; original; primary; raw; level; cause; source
item.A:
yuán
原则 (原則) yuánzé principle; doctrine

item.Q:
Write the character:
to remember; to note; mark; sign; to record
item.A:
traditional: 記
jì
记者 (記者) jìzhě reporter; journalist

item.Q:
Write the character:
to change; to alter; to transform; to correct
item.A:
gǎi
改变 (改變) gǎibiàn to change; to alter; to transform

item.Q:
Write the character:
God; unusual; mysterious; soul; spirit; divine essence; lively; spiritual being
item.A:
shén
精神 jīngshén vigor; vitality; drive; spiritual; mental; psychological
